studio-intro:
Akizuki Studio was independently founded by AkibaCat in 2022.
Specializing in UI/UX design, responsive web development, and small program development.
copyright: Copyright © 2022-2025 Akizuki Studio. All rights reserved.
service1-desc:
Provide professional UI design services,
helping you create beautiful user interfaces.
service2-desc:
Provide responsive web development services,
ensuring your website displays correctly on all devices.
service3-desc:
Provide small program development services,
helping you create easy-to-use applications.
